org.axiondb.types
Class StringClob

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.types.StringClob
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxionClob, Clob
public class StringClob
extends Object
implements AxionClob

A Clob based upon a simple String. This type allows any string value to be treated as a AxionClob.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $ $Date: 2003/05/14 17:00:30 $
